title: Noam Chomsky on 2020 Vote: 'It's So Simple That There's Nothing To Debate About"
description:
Prof. Noam Chomsky is baffled by the Left's debate on whether or for whom to vote and see's the discussion as "a sign of the collapse of Left Culture." 

Prof. Chomsky is a revered linguist, a philosopher, cognitive scientist, prolific author of over 100 books, political activist, and historian. He is Laureate Professor of Linguistics at the University of Arizona and Institute Professor Emeritus at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT). Prof. Chomsky has focused on matters of mass media, neoliberalism, capitalism, foreign policy, environmental policy, and workers' rights.
